January” 4, 1954
Mr. C. L« Morgan, Jr*
Acquisitions Librarian
University of Miami
Coral Gables 46, Florida
Dear Mr. Morgan!
Thank you for your letter of December 29 requesting the
he cost of THREE ISAES OF J3EW YCRK
It is available at $5.00 including
delivery charges.
Please let us know if we can be of further assistance.
Sincerely,
(Mrs.) Mary Sohvartabart
Secretary
